response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a comprehensive setup service to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to life with you.", "product_price": 12000}
